summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Northlake Avenue from 14th Avenue N.E. to 15th Avenue N.E. et al in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers under Ordinance No. 15764, creating Local Improvement District No. 1461 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
